1.name: Çağatay Çivici
1.title: Founder
1.shortBio: Cagatay Civici is a member of JavaServer Faces Expert Group in JCP, the founder of popular open source...
1.bio: Cagatay Civici is a member of JavaServer Faces Expert Group in JCP, the founder of popular open source PrimeFaces and PrimeNG projects. He’s a recognized speaker in international conferences such as JavaOne, Devoxx.

2.name: Bahadır Akın
2.title: Software Development Engineer
2.shortBio: Bahadır AKIN is an enthusiastic software developer who concerns about how to develop products with high...
2.bio: Bahadır AKIN is an enthusiastic software developer who concerns about how to develop products with high quality. He had worked for companies with various sizes which includes both startups and international companies, and worked in several different titles. Although, through his professional life, he usually worked on the server side, he has always been curious on the client side, too. So do not get surprised if you heard his blabbering about both Java and JavaScript throughout his blogs. He is currently working as a Software Development Engineer at Amazon.

18.name: AMahdy Abdelaziz
18.title: Trainer & Developer Advocate
18.shortBio: International technical speaker, Google developer expert (GDE), trainer and developer advocate...
18.bio: International technical speaker, Google developer expert (GDE), trainer and developer advocate. Passionate about Web and Mobile apps development, including PWA, offline-first design, in-browser database, and cross platform tools. Also interested in Android internals such as building custom ROMs and customize AOSP for embedded devices.
